content:
# The error indicates that I need to pass the actual entity reference of the Stone Furnace instead of a string when inserting items. 
# I will retrieve the Stone Furnace entity from the list of entities on the map and then insert the coal and iron ore.

# Let's get the Stone Furnace entity first.
furnace_entity = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})[0]  # Assuming it's the first entity in the list.

# Now, I will insert 5 units of coal and 10 units of iron ore into the Stone Furnace using the entity reference.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 coal into the Stone Furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=furnace_entity, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 iron ore into the Stone Furnace.

# After inserting, I will check the inventory again.
print(f"Inventory after inserting resources: {inspect_inventory()}")
